overview: Strategic hands on product leader developing products in social web, mobile, media, toy/gaming platforms and consumer electronics. Expertise in design innovation and technology development, with extensive knowledge of interaction, experience and service design. Strong technology background combined with strategic development skills. Able to translate emerging technologies and industry directions to strategic company objectives that respects what is relevant for a business to succeed.
